confirm_exit: Are you sure you want to exit the game?
on_bet_prompt: 5 OR MORE SCATTER SYMBOLS APPEARS ANYWHERE ON REELS TRIGGER BONUS FEATURE
pays_based_on_bet_level: Prize values are based on current bet level
pays_free_spins:
Black and white 5*3 slot, 25 lines, Spin streak slots, 3 of a kind win will hold winning lines and keep respinning until no more win lines occurs.

The uniqueness about this concept is all symbols are black and white until you hit a win, therefore making wins clearer to the player. Black & White will appeal to both beginner and seasoned players. There will be vines on the side of the reels, randomly they will become colourful, As a tease they will go colourful for a few seconds and return to black & white, as a win multiplier in 1- 60 spins they will award the player random wilds. To win a bonus round, 3 or more scatter must hit, in turn the players will get respins until bonus round is awarded with 5 or more scatters.
pays_malfunction_voids: Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
pays_scatter: 5 or more Scatter symbols in any position trigger 'Free Spins'.
pays_scatter_rules: Scatter pays are awarded for 3 or more Scatter symbols in any position on the reels.
pays_see_game_rules: For more information, see the game rules.
pays_ways_longest_only: Only the longest matching combination per symbol is paid.
pays_ways_multiple: Way wins are multiplied by coins bet amount.
pays_ways_rules: Way wins are awarded for matching symbols on adjacent reels, from the leftmost reel to the rightmost reel.
pays_wild: • WILD symbol substitutes for all symbols except SCATTER and SPECIAL Symbol.
scatter_defintion:
• SCATTER symbol appears only on Base Game.
  • SCATTER symbol appears on all Reels.
  • 5 or more SCATTER symbols in any position trigger 'Free Spins'.
special_symbol_defintion:
• SPECIAL symbol appears only on Free Spins.
  • SPECIAL symbol appears on all Reels.
  • Every 5th SPECIAL symbol awards 1 extra Free Spin.
reality_check_msg: You have been playing for {minutes}. Do you want to continue?
system_maintenance_mode: The server is currently in maintenance mode.  Please try again later
second_msg: Hit a win to begin spin streak
Free_Spins: Welcome to a world where colour brings prizes
general_rule:
• Base Game has fixed 25 lines.
  • Only highest win paid for selected line.
  • All winnings are paid from left to right.
  • Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
  • All wins are multiplied by bet per line.
general_rules:
• Base Game has fixed 25 lines.
  • Only highest win paid for selected line.
  • All winnings are paid from left to right.
  • Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
  • All wins are multiplied by bet per line .
streak_text:
In the Base Game, 3 of a kind including SCATTER symbols trigger a Hold 'n Respin Feature with the remaining symbols.
    Respin Feature continues until a more valuable win is created by any symbol.
ReSpin_Bonus_Feature_text:
Respin Bonus Feature can be awarded when 3 or more SCATTER symbols appear on the Base Game.
    In Respin Bonus Feature, respin will continue until 5 or more SCATTER symbols appear on the Base Game.
Extended_Reel_text:
During Free Spins, player will collect SPECIAL symbol that land on any reel. Each SPECIAL symbol on the reels will be counted and every 5th SPECIAL symbol unlocks another reel position and awards 1 extra Free Spin.
    Each of the first 5 positions unlock 2 extra paylines, the second 5 positions unlock 3 extra paylines each.
FreeSpins_Intro:
You will unlock reels and gain additional Free Spins
for every 5 Black and White symbols you land.
May colour bring you Winnings
Good luck!
Random_wild_text: In the Base Game, every initial spin has a chance of 3 to 8 random WILD symbols replacing existing symbols but never replace the SCATTER symbol. In Free Spins, random WILD occur more frequently and award 3 to 12 random WILDS but never replace the SPECIAL symbol.
free_spin:
5 or more SCATTER symbols in Respin Bonus Feature trigger the Free Spins. More SCATTER symbols in Respin Bonus Feature will award higher number of Free Spins.
  • SCATTER symbol does not appear during Free Spins.
  • SPECIAL symbol appears only during Free Spins.
  • SPECIAL symbol does not trigger a Hold 'n Respin Feature.
RESPIN_FEATURE:
Spin the Black & White reels
for colourful wins, all win lines
bring colour to your life.
BONUS_FEATURE:
Unlock reels in Free Spins mode to
bring colour and winnings
to your life.
rules:
Black and White has 5*3 Reel grid and 25 winning lines in Base Game.

The game features are Streak Feature, Respin Bonus Feature, Random Wild, Free Spins and Extended Reels Features.

How to play:

To play the game :

  1. Choose the stake value by pressing the plus and minus buttons on either side of the stake.
  2. Press the play button to spin the Reels.

RTP% (Return to Player%):

The overall game theoretical RTP is demo (Main Game 73.31% Free Spins 22.77%).

Payouts:

The Base Game wager is minimum 25 credits.

appears in the Base Game only whereas appears in Free Spins only.

WILD substitutes for all symbols except and .

Line wins pay highest winning from left to right.

Main Game:

In-reel Modifiers and Bonus Features:

Random vines can become colorful.

Random Wilds can activate anytime in the Base Game or Free Spins.

Free Spins cannot be retriggered.

Streak Feature:

In the Base Game, 3 of a Kind including trigger a Hold 'n Respin Feature with the remaining symbols.

Respin Feature continues until a more valuable win is created by any symbol.

Respin Bonus Feature:

Respin Bonus Feature can be awarded when 3 or more appear on the Base Game.

In Respins Bonus Feature, respin will continue until 5 or more appear on the Base Game.

Free Spins:

5 or more in Respin Bonus Feature trigger the Free Spins. More in Respin Bonus Feature will award higher number of Free Spins.

  • does not appear during Free Spins.
  • appears only during Free Spins.
  • does not trigger a Hold 'n Respin Feature.

Extended Reel:

During Free Spins, the player will collect that land on any Reel. Each on the Reels will be counted and every 5th unlocks another reel position and awards 1 extra Free Spin.

Each of the first 5 positions unlock 2 extra paylines each, the second 5 positions unlock 3 extra paylines each.

Random Wild:

In the Base Game, every initial spin has a chance of 3 to 8 Random WILD symbols replacing existing symbols but never replace the . In Free Spins Random WILD occur more frequently and award 3 to 12 Random WILDS but never replace the .

Autoplay:

Autoplay plays a number of spins automatically. In the Autoplay options, select the number of spins, then enter the maximum loss limit to begin Auto spins.

Single win limits (per game).

The remaining auto spins are displayed on the stop button.

Autoplay can be cancelled at any time by pressing the stop button. Autoplay will automatically stop if no spins are remaining; if any of the set limits are reached; if there is insufficient balance or if anything occurs that requires player intervention.

Connectivity and Malfunction:

Players cannot be unfairly advantaged or disadvantaged by disconnections or network interruptions. In rare and exceptional circumstances where a game state cannot be restored, such a malfunction would void all pays and play.

Performance:

Players may be inconvenienced or disadvantaged by poor performance as a result of technical issues such as slow network speeds or slower user devices.
